channel.title: INfinance

item.title: Should you pay someone to do your taxes? Answer these 3 questions first.
item.description: You can file your tax return starting Monday, Jan. 26. This is the first tax season with Trump’s big new tax law on the books.

item.title: ‘Dr. Google’ is done. AI chatbots like OpenAI and Claude will change how we search for health information.
item.description: OpenAI and Anthropic are moving into the complicated world of health information. Will ChatGPT help or hurt patient health?

item.title: It’s make-your-mind-up time for Rio Tinto as deadline looms for decision on $260 billion deal
item.description: Rio Tinto has until Feb. 5 to inform the U.K. Takeover Panel if it intends to make an offer for Glencore.

item.title: I’m a CPA. I found out that an executive assistant makes $10K more than me. Can I use this to get a raise?

item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
